remarks: If an integer minus 1 is divisible by a prime number, then the integer to the power of the prime number minus 2 is 1 modulo the prime number. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Aug-2018.)
statement: powm2modprm $p |- ( ( P e. Prime /\ A e. ZZ ) -> ( P || ( A - 1 ) -> ( ( A ^ ( P - 2 ) ) mod P ) = 1 ) ) $.
